metadata.title: CVE-2022-4439 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Aura in Google Chrome on Windows prior to 108.0.5359.124allowed a remote attacker who convinced the user to engage in specific UIinteractions to potentially exploit heap corruption via specific UIinteractions. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
